articles.title: Macron resignation - tinged New Year address
articles.summary: L ess than 10 minutes. For once, Emmanuel Macron â€“ whose words have lost much of their impact â€“ kept it brief on Wednesday, December 31, for his penultimate New Year's address to the French people. Bound by this constitutional ritual, the president, who had not spoken directly to the nation for several months (his last major television appearance on the TF1 channel was in May) tried to defend his record. articles.title: NATO Would Face Heavier Losses Than Ukraine in Russia War : Officer
articles.summary: NATO forces would likely see heavier losses than Ukraine has in a war with Russia, a senior officer told Business Insider, and that possibility is driving a rethink of battlefield medical care. Drones are watching much of the front line, making it nearly impossible to get wounded troops access to medical care within the ' golden hour ,' the critical first 60 minutes after a severe injury when access to medical care may determine life or death. articles.title: Kospi starts 2026 on a fresh high
articles.summary: Seoul's benchmark tops 3,500 trillion won in market value An electronic board at a Woori Bank dealing room in central Seoul shows the Kospi closing at 4,309.63, while Samsung Electronics and SK hynix finished at record high levels of 128,500 won and 677,000 won, respectively, on Friday.
